dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5169 IH: To amend the Competitive, Special, and Facilities Research Grant Act to prioritize research on sensor and imager technology in agriculture, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Soto introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Competitive, Special, and Facilities Research Grant Act to prioritize research on sensor and imager technology in agriculture, and for other purposes.

section.header: Sensor and imager technology in agriculture

subsection.text: Section 2(b)(2)(E) of the Competitive, Special, and Facilities Research Grant Act (7 U.S.C. 3157(b)(2)(E)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating clauses (iii) and (iv) as clauses (iv) and (v), respectively; and
by inserting after clause (ii) the following new clause:

subsection.text: Paragraph (4) of section 412(b) of the Agricultural Research, Extension, and Education Reform Act of 1998 (7 U.S.C. 7632(b)) is amended to read as follows:

subparagraph.text: improved mechanization and technologies that delay or inhibit ripening; and
